Name: Ancient Chinese Dynasties: Lesson for Kids
Subject: ['dating', 'unrest and war', 'religion and spirituality', 'buddhism', 'society']
Description: Kings and emperors ruled over China for four thousand years. Learn about the great dynasties and royal families of Chinese history in this lesson, from the Xia dynasty to the Qing dynasty.
Concepts: ['China', 'Qing Dynasty', 'History of China', 'Han Chinese', 'Yuan Dynasty', 'Mandate of Heaven', 'Dynasties in Chinese history', 'Ming Dynasty']
